visualisation.description:
A visualisation that can display locations of data on a floorplan.
There can be a number of floorplans per building, a number of buildings per building group and there can be a number of building groups defined (e.g. one per campus).
It is necessary to configure FloorMap with configuration for your installation but it is usually easier to create a local floormap visualisation that is configured for your installation.
This can be achieved by cloning the stroom-visualisations-dev git repository, and following the instructions in stroom-content-local/builders/FloorMapLocalBuilder/README.md.
visualisation.name: FloorMap
